title: Dallas Mavericks ' revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 18 data points.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 307.0 was reached at Year 2018/19
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 105.0 was reported at Year 2001/02
